subject: Biology
question_text: Fig. 1.1 shows two cells from the leaf of a plant observed using a light microscope.

difficulty.justification: Requires identification and understanding of cell structures and their functions

sub_questions.text: Complete Table 1.1 to identify the structures labelled A and B and to describe the function of each structure.
State one structure that is not visible in Fig. 1.1 but would be visible in the cytoplasm in an electron micrograph of the same two cells.

tables.description: Table 1.1 for structure identification and function

images.label: Fig. 1.1
images.description: Two plant cells showing cell wall, cytoplasm, and labeled structures A and B
